meta.name: description
meta.content: Developing lifelong learners and responsible citizens for a global society is the mission of the Webster Parish School Board. In partnership with the local communities, our responsive and innovative professional staff will provide learning experiences that foster the uniqueness of each child and promote their happiness and success.
